website_summaries.verdict: The HOVR Rise is a well-rounded training shoe from Under Armour which comes at a reasonable price. Although not recommended for heavier lifts, it can take anything else you throw at it at the gym, including short runs.
pros: Plenty of users say that it is their go-to choice for training: from treadmill running to HIIT and moderate weightlifting
Buyers agree that it is one of the most comfortable trainers they’ve ever had
The shoe offers the right amount of cushioning to support the foot for long periods of time, as stated by most wearers
It ensures lateral support during aggressive side-to-side moves, based on some reviews
The majority considers this model as stylish and visually appealing
The outsole traction has been appreciated by more than a few reviewers
Multiple testers mention that it is one of the most lightweight cross-trainers on the market
cons: Expert CrossFitters warn that the shoe may not offer stability for the heavier Olympic weightlifting

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion look good and certainly different.
customer_reviews.text: First pair bought of this make always buy Adidas,but these are certainly different might not be to everyone taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, easy to slip on and off
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, easy to put on and off, takes time to get familiar with how tight to lace. Good for light weight training. My bad, forgot running shoes for treadmill workout and used these.. Wont use them again for running in..
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my son ,fast delivery, and fit to size.
customer_reviews.author: chas

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband, he loves them says they are very comfortable x
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cross fit. The sole unit provides loads of grip. The trainers are comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded the expectations
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size with perfect fit. Unbelievable material. After a long time something which I ordered online exceeded the expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Abhi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe for walking, training and basically everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Serb

customer_reviews.title: Great gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very good gym shoe, copes with cardio well, haswell as heavy lifting, would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good all rounder for classes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stability and cushioning for classes like body attack and body pump
customer_reviews.author: T MacLachlan

customer_reviews.title: Good all rounder,well made.
customer_reviews.text: Anything that’s endorsed by AJ is good enough for me, excellent trainers for gym use.
customer_reviews.author: Landersun

customer_reviews.title: Best gym trainer
customer_reviews.text: Best training shoes I've bought. Never got on with Nike metcons before, gave these a go and they're perfect
customer_reviews.author: Huw Evans

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Plastic on the back of the shoe cuts into your leg
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for Great Price
customer_reviews.text: All good, for price its very good quality and comfortable to wear and run.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Good fit & comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a present for my husband. He says they fit well & are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jingers

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but only if your training is:
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for: dynamic workouts, fitness, HIIT, short run, a bit of weight training. They are not for you if you are just running or doing mainly weight workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's HOVR Rise Fitness Shoes
feature_bullets: UA HOVR technology provides a 'zero-gravity feel' to maintain energy return that helps eliminate impact step after step
Compression mesh Energy Web contains and moulds UA HOVR foam to give back the energy you put in
Material Composition: UPPER: 63% Textile,37% Synthetic~OUTSOLE: 100% Rubber
Lightweight, abrasion-resistant mesh upper with 3D print for maximum durability and breathability that can withstand any workout
Overlapping films and dual-external heel counter hug your foot for added stability
Full rubber outsole to enhance multi-directional traction and durability
